text: Ej mardon, harcand ʙikuşed, hargiz natavoned, ki dar mijoni zanon (dar muhaʙʙat va xuftuxoʙ) ʙa adolat raftor kuned. Harcand ʙar adolat haris ʙoşed. Aknun ki hargiz natavoned mijoni zanon tamoman adolat kuned, jakʙora ʙa sūi jake az onro, ki dūstaş medored majl nakuned, to digarero, ki dūstaş namedored muallaq monad. Agar ʙa saloh oed va parhezgorī kuned, Alloh omūrzanda va mehruʙon ast va az kamʙudihoe, ki qaʙlan az şumo sar zada şumoro azoʙ namekunad
